body_html:
@abhinavvishnu what is the ballpark overhead / performance penalty of python route vs refactoring transport architecture dependency in core ? 20% ? 40%?

@yaroslavvb what are unit tests for gRPC dependencies in the repository ? ease of integration and various ugliness of same nature should never be a development objective. what is your estimate for refactoring ?
